site.title: Oxford Academy Robotics
site.description: Oxford Academy Robotics - Excellence in FRC, FTC, and VEX robotics competitions. Join our award-winning STEM education programs.
site.keywords: Oxford Academy Robotics, FRC Team 4079, FTC Teams, VEX Teams, STEM Education, Robotics Competition

aboutBrief.title: About Us
aboutBrief.description: Oxford Academy Robotics is a student-run organization that competes in the FIRST Robotics Competition (FRC), FIRST Tech Challenge (FTC), and VEX Robotics Competition. Our mission is to inspire students to pursue careers in STEM fields by providing them with the opportunity to learn, compete, and thrive in a supportive environment.

goals.title: Our Goals
goals.description: We are Oxford Academy Robotics, a high school robotics team based in Cypress, California. We are dedicated to inspiring students to pursue careers in STEM fields through hands-on experience in robotics.

hero.title: Oxford Academy Robotics
hero.subtitle: Inspiring the Next Generation of Innovators
hero.description: Since 2012, we've been empowering students through competitive robotics, building not just robots, but future engineers, innovators, and leaders who will shape tomorrow's world.

cards.title: Mission
cards.description: To inspire and prepare students for careers in STEM through competitive robotics, fostering innovation, teamwork, and technical excellence.

cards.title: Vision
cards.description: To be a leading robotics program that empowers students to become the next generation of engineers and innovators who will shape the future.

cards.title: Values
cards.description: Excellence, Innovation, Collaboration, Integrity, and Continuous Learning drive everything we do as we build both robots and character.

programList.title: FIRST Robotics Competition
programList.description: Our flagship program where students design, build, and compete with 120-pound robots in an international competition that combines the excitement of sport with the rigors of science and technology.

programList.title: FIRST Tech Challenge
programList.description: Students design, build, and program robots to compete in an alliance format against other teams. FTC is designed for those who want to compete head to head, using a robotics platform.

programList.title: VEX Robotics Competition
programList.description: Where our journey began! Students work in teams to design and build a robot to play against other teams in a game-based engineering challenge.

cards.title: Student Success
cards.description: 100% of our alumni go on to pursue higher education, with 85% entering STEM fields.

cards.title: Competition Excellence
cards.description: Over 50 awards earned across all competition levels and multiple championship appearances.

cards.title: Community Outreach
cards.description: Mentoring younger teams and promoting STEM education throughout our local community.

cards.title: Innovation Hub
cards.description: Students develop real-world engineering skills and innovative solutions to complex challenges.

join.title: Ready to Join the Future?
join.description: Whether you're interested in mechanical engineering, programming, business, or design, there's a place for you on our team. Join us in building the future, one robot at a time.

hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.subtitle: Ready to join our robotics family?

form.title: Contact Us
form.subtitle: Have questions? Want to join? We'd love to hear from you!

info.address:
Oxford Academy
5172 Orange Ave
Cypress, CA 90630

frc.title: FIRST Robotics Competition
frc.subtitle: Team 4079 - The Nuclear Knights
frc.description: Our FRC team competes in the most challenging high school robotics competition, building 120+ pound robots to compete in dynamic games.

ftc.title: FIRST Tech Challenge
ftc.subtitle: Building Innovation Together
ftc.description: Our FTC teams focus on designing, building, and programming robots to compete in alliance-based competitions.

vex.title: VEX Robotics Competition
vex.subtitle: Precision Engineering
vex.description: VEX Robotics allows students to design and build robots using the VEX platform, emphasizing mechanical design and programming skills.

teamsOverview.name: FRC Team 4079
teamsOverview.description: Our FRC team competes in the FIRST Robotics Competition, building 120+ pound robots to play challenging games in intense competitions.

teamsOverview.name: FTC Teams 19812 & 23796
teamsOverview.description: Our FTC teams design, build, and program smaller robots while learning valuable engineering and teamwork skills.

teamsOverview.name: VEX Robotics
teamsOverview.description: VEX teams focus on rapid prototyping and strategic gameplay with standardized robot kits.

teamMembers.name: Rishi Mishra
teamMembers.bio: Rishi has been with the team for 4 years and leads our strategic planning and outreach initiatives. He's passionate about making STEM accessible to all students.

teamMembers.name: Aaron Truong
teamMembers.bio: Aaron leads our FRC team with exceptional technical and leadership skills. He specializes in mechanical design and team coordination.

hero.title: Latest News & Updates
hero.subtitle: Stay informed with our team's achievements
hero.description: Stay up to date with our team's achievements and activities

articles.title: FRC Team 4079 Wins Regional Championship
articles.excerpt: Our FRC team achieved first place at the Los Angeles Regional, securing a spot at the World Championships.
articles.content: After months of preparation and hard work, FRC Team 4079 'Quantum Leap' has won the Los Angeles Regional Championship...
articles.author: Erick Tran

articles.title: New VEX Season Kicks Off
articles.excerpt: Our VEX teams are ready for the new competitive season with innovative robot designs.
articles.content: The new VEX season brings exciting challenges and our teams have been working hard on their robot designs...
articles.author: Erick Tran

articles.title: STEM Outreach Program Reaches 500 Students
articles.excerpt: Our community outreach program has successfully engaged over 500 local students in STEM activities.
articles.content: Through various workshops and presentations, our team has inspired hundreds of students to explore STEM fields...
articles.author: Erick Tran

articles.title: FTC Teams Advance to State Championship
articles.excerpt: Both of our FTC teams have qualified for the state championship tournament.
articles.content: After impressive performances at regionals, teams 19812 and 23796 are heading to state championships...
articles.author: Erick Tran

articles.title: Meet Our New Team Members
articles.excerpt: We welcome several new talented students to our robotics family this semester.
articles.content: This semester brings fresh faces and new perspectives to our robotics teams...
articles.author: Erick Tran
